page.title: 14School Christmas Party
page.content: Every year Markinch school has a Christmas party.We play games and special dances.All the classes have a party,we have them on different days,and the parties are in the afternoon from two o'clock till quarter past three.We wear fashionable clothes and shoes.Our music is up to date.We have soft drinks,biscuits and sausage rolls.We win prizes,such as smarties,fruit gums,note-pads,pencils and rubbers.We play dances like The American Barn dance,and games like pass the parcel.In Pitteuchar West all classes have a party in the hall the same as those described above.The primary 7 class however have a Xmas Disco instead.This is held in the evening and consists of dancing to recorded music.At this party some of us exchange gifts and some of us bring our teacher a Christmas present.
